Description.Text: The Amblehurst Hotel is situated in the heart of Sale in Manchester. For over 25 years the Amblehurst has offered its services to a vast variety of customers ensuring their guests are offered a high standard of service together with a relaxed and friendly atmosphere. The privately owned award-winning hotel has 50 beautiful rooms all en-suite including 2 luxurious suites for special occasions. The grounds at the Amblehurst also contain a fully licensed bar, barbecue/beer garden, conference facilities and function rooms, on site car park together with disabled facilities, not forgetting the outstanding restaurant which always leaves a lasting impression on its diners. Car Park for 70 Vehicles.
Sale town centre home of many local shops and businesses, and only walking distance from major bus routes and trams stops. Manchester City Centre. Manchester Chill Factor. Trafford Centre.

Standard Twin - Standard Twin with two twin bed includes all the basic amenities.
Standard SIngle - Standard Single with one twin bed includes all the basic amenities.
Standard Double - Standard Double with one double bed includes all the basic amenities.
